name: Hype Williams
title: Legendary Music Video Editor & Director
bio: Iconic editor and director who defined 90s hip-hop video aesthetics. Known for revolutionary editing techniques, fish-eye lenses, colored filters, and ultra-fast pacing that synchronized perfectly with beats.

iconic_edits.title: The Rain (Supa Dupa Fly)
iconic_edits.signature_technique: Ultra-fast jump cuts synchronized to beat, colored filters, creative transitions

signature_style.description: Ultra-fast, beat-driven editing with creative transitions, colored overlays, and experimental camera work
signature_style.dominant_technique: Jump cuts synchronized to hi-hats and snares
signature_style.music_sync_philosophy: Every cut is a beat. Edit follows the percussion strictly.

hip_hop.beat_sync_approach: Obsessive synchronization to 808s, snares, hi-hats. Every cut on a beat.
hip_hop.cut_style: Jump cuts, match cuts, whip transitions, speed ramps on drops

pop.beat_sync_approach: Synchronized to main rhythm, looser on quieter sections
pop.cut_style: Mix of jump cuts and smooth transitions

rock.beat_sync_approach: Synchronized to drum fills and main beat

electronic.beat_sync_approach: Ultra-precise to synthesizer rhythm and bass drops
electronic.cut_style: Freeze frames on drops, fast cuts on builds

indie.beat_sync_approach: Conversational rhythm editing, follows emotional beats
indie.cut_style: Thoughtful transitions, occasional quick cuts for emphasis

freeze_frames.usage: On impact moments - beat drops, vocal hits, action peaks

speed_ramps.usage: During transitions, beat builds, action moments

whip_transitions.usage: Between scene changes, especially on beat changes
whip_transitions.effect_style: Colored whips matching video mood (neon, grayscale, etc.)

jump_cuts.usage: Primary editing technique - cuts on beat throughout

match_cuts.technique: Match composition, color, or motion between clips

crossfades.usage: Rare, reserved for emotional or atmospheric moments
crossfades.color_treatment: Sometimes fade to color (black, white, or mood color)

flash_frames.usage: Single frames of color/image for visual punctuation
flash_frames.color: Often white, black, or neon depending on mood

editing_philosophy.core_principle: The edit IS the performance. Rhythm and style are inseparable.
editing_philosophy.performance_vs_broll: 70% performance cuts synchronized to music, 30% creative B-roll with style
